Package edu.cnm.deepdive.northstarsharingclient.service

Class SensorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.northstarsharingclient.service.SensorService
  • public class SensorService
extends Object
    Utility service to acquire the camera orientation asynchronously.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SensorService​(Context context)
      Create an instance of the SensorService.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Observable<float[]> getOrientation()
      Get the GPS coordinate float[] asynchronously.
      void startSensors()
      Turn on the sensor service updates.
      void stopSensors()
      Turns off the position sensors to prevent unnecessary battery consumption and avoid any memory leaks.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SensorService

        public SensorService​(Context context)
        Create an instance of the SensorService. A Context is required for pop-up warnings and to initially acquire the Android SensorManager service.
        Parameters:
        context - The context in which the LocationService is being used.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrientation

        public Observable<float[]> getOrientation()
        Get the GPS coordinate float[] asynchronously. The values stored exactly match with the LocationManager's getOrientation() method. Index [0] = azimuth, [1] = pitch, and [2] = roll. As lifecycle data running on a separate thread, this information will need to be observed.
        Returns:
        {@link Observable<float[]>}

      • startSensors

        public void startSensors()
        Turn on the sensor service updates. This service must be turned off with the stopSensors() method to prevent unnecessary battery consumption and avoid any memory leaks.

      • stopSensors

        public void stopSensors()
        Turns off the position sensors to prevent unnecessary battery consumption and avoid any memory leaks.
